News.headline: Daggers Against Racism Day 2017
News.short_description: The Daggers will be hosting their annual Daggers Against Racism Day for 2017, for the game against Guiseley AFC.
News.description:
The Daggers will once again be hosting their award winning annual Daggers Against Racism Day for 2017, which this year will fall for their game against Guiseley AFC on Saturday 18th February, KO 3.00pm.

Get down to the Chigwell Construction Stadium on Saturday 18th February to celebrate the annual Daggers Against Racism Day, where the Daggers will be taking on Guiseley AFC. This day highlights the Club's commitment against all forms of racism and in particularly demonstrates that racism will never be acceptable within football.

Once again in an effort to include all sections of our community admission for this game will be heavily discounted and this year we would like to thank  Johnstone's Paints  who have agreed to support the day and allow us to continue the pricing formula.
There will be great ticket prices on offer for this game, but please note that the cheaper ticket prices will be in advance ONLY and tickets will be going up to normal prices on the day.

As well as the cheaper ticket prices In addition to the fantastic offers available there will be a number of other events going on during the day, which will be announced nearer the time. at a later date.

Advanced Ticket prices:

Terrace:
Adults - £2.50
Concessions - £0.50
Junior (10-16) - £0.50
Under 10 - FREE*

Seating:
Adults - £9.99
Concessions - £4.99
Junior (10-16) - £4.99
Under 10 - FREE*
*Under 10's are free if purchased in advance of matchday with an Adult equivalent.

Please note that the discounts are only available for purchases made in advance.

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21   
Club shop: Opening Times
